markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17+"
    pfs=""
>
[Awakened Metal Shot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1189)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 168</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** round

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These bullets are formed from a liquefied high-grade precious metal and enchanted to unlock that metal's true potential. Each version has a different special effect.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Awakened Metal Shot (Awakened Adamantine Shot)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 168</row>

**Price** 3,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The shot is a high-grade [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=271) bullet. The awakened adamantine breaks through any resistance. The shot ignores the first 20 resistance a creature has to physical damage, all damage, or piercing or bludgeoning damage. Against a [golem](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=57) or creature who already has a resistance bypassed by adamantine, or a weakness to adamantine, the shot shatters the target's defenses, causing them to become [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) for 1 minute instead. Because adamantine is uncommon, this version of _awakened metal shot_ is uncommon even for gunslingers or other characters with access to uncommon guns and bullets from this book.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Awakened Metal Shot (Awakened Cold Iron Shot)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 168</row>

**Price** 2,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The shot is a high-grade [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=272) bullet. The awakened cold iron attempts to disrupt [enchantments](/Traits.aspx?ID=61) the target placed on others' minds. You can name a creature you believe to be enchanted by your target or allow the shot to choose an enchanted creature randomly. On a hit, the shot attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the enchantment the target is using to manipulate that creature's mind. The counteract level is 9, and the counteract modifier is +27. If you fail (but don't critically fail) the counteract check against a [demon](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=28) or [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=69), you get a success instead. If you hit a demon or fey with no active enchantment effects on other creatures, the target is [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 minute instead.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Awakened Metal Shot (Awakened Silver Shot)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 168</row>

**Price** 2,300 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The shot is a high-grade [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=277) bullet. The awakened silver gleams with altered celestial moonlight designed to weaken and expose [devils](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=30) and [werecreatures](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=100). On a hit, it attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) any [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) effect on the target. The counteract level is 9, and the counteract modifier is +27. If you fail (but don't critically fail) the counteract check against a devil or a werecreature, you get a success instead. If you counteracted the [Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8) ability, the creature can't use that ability again for 1 round, or 1 minute on a critical success. If you hit a devil or werecreature not under a polymorph effect, the target is [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) for 1 minute instead.
name: Awakened Metal Shot (Awakened Silver Shot)
